messages.subject: AnneO's here!
messages.msgSnippet: I just got an e-mail from Ren with a link to this group at the bottom of it ~ so I joined! And I just wanted to write about John Holt ~ Well dang! If I d
messages.messageBody:
"I just got an e-mail from Ren with a link to this group at the
bottom
of it ~ so I joined! And I just wanted to write about John Holt ~"

Well dang! If I'd known it was THAT easy to getcha here, I would
have sent you a link a long time ago.:)

Glad you came to the party Anne....hope you stay.

OH, and I also felt a deep sense of loss when I found out John Holt
had died before I ever read a book he wrote. I still feel that loss
when I read a great quote from him...like the unschooling community
has lost something really profound and important that we NEED.

Ren

messages.subject: AnneO's here!
messages.msgSnippet: Just to let all you newbies know that you re in for a real treat----if we can keep her here!  Anne Ohman just signed up! She s not a fan of  e-lists; but if
messages.messageBody:
Just to let all you newbies know that you're in for a real treat----if we
can keep her here! <g> Anne Ohman just signed up! She's not a fan of e-lists;
but if she stays, you'll be inspired by what she has to offer!

Glad you're here, Anne!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
